title: HedgeFx
author: HedgeFx
content: Hi friends,I'm looking for 200 usdt loan without collateral (take a look at my recent hystory in terms of loan/repayement). Hope someone would help me!Loan Amount: 200 UsdtLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 220 UsdtLoan Repay Date: July 31 or earlierType of Collateral: NoneTRC20 - USDT address: TFqN1GmbXtQNZu1BsuhrExzpKLszXBfQ4U

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Hi, I am willing to pay it. Let me know how to proceed.EDIT: On looking at your TRC20 address, it shows you already have 2,059.524921 USDT available in your account.https://tronscan.org/#/address/TFqN1GmbXtQNZu1BsuhrExzpKLszXBfQ4U/transfers
